problem.title: Web3 is still complex. We fixed it.
problem.description: These problems prevent mass adoption of Web3 technologies

items.title: Fragmentation and Complexity
items.text: Dozens of networks, bridges, and tokens. The user gets lost in technical details, which is the main barrier to mass adoption.

items.title: Dumb Wallets
items.text: Existing wallets (MetaMask) are passive executors. They don't answer the question: "How should I *best* send $100 from network A to network B?"

items.title: High Risks and Barriers
items.text: Fees, 'gas', phishing addresses, suboptimal swaps. Users lose money at every step without an assistant.

solution.title: Web3 in your Telegram
solution.description: We created not just a wallet, but an intelligent assistant that lives in your messenger. Secure, convenient and always at hand.

features.title: 100% Non-Custodial
features.text: Keys are encrypted (AES-256) and stored only with you.

features.title: Default Environmentally Friendly
features.text: Priority on low carbon footprint blockchains.

features.title: DeFi & RWA Hub
features.text: Ready UI for P2P lending and tokenized assets.

upa.title: UPA Engine:
upa.description: Forget about networks, bridges and gas. UPA (Universal Payment Agent) is your intelligent assistant that makes cross-chain transfers as simple as bank transfers.

steps.title: 1. AI Analysis
steps.text: You enter an address. The UPA Engine analyzes it: "Is this an exchange? A private wallet? Which network does it prefer?"

steps.title: 2. Multi-Routing
steps.text: The engine calculates 10+ routes (swaps, bridges, L2) for your transaction in real-time.

steps.title: 3. Optimal Path
steps.text: UPA offers you ONE, the cheapest, fastest and most environmentally friendly route. Turning 5 clicks into 1.

status.title: Ready product, not just an idea
status.description: You get a ready, secure and optimized Frontend product, saving at least <highlight>6 months</highlight> of R&D team work.
status.ready_note: Product ready for integration with your backend

phases.title: Phase 1: Backend & UPA API
phases.text: Implementation of UPA Engine backend logic, deployment of smart contracts for DeFi and gamification.

phases.title: Phase 2: Browser Extension
phases.text: Porting functionality to Chrome, Firefox, and Brave extensions. Sync with Mini App.

phases.title: Phase 3: Mobile Native
phases.text: Launching full native apps for iOS and Android for maximum audience reach.

phases.title: Phase 4: P2P & Advanced
phases.text: Launching P2P Marketplace, NFT integration, staking, and hardware wallet support.
